GV05svetu_pu:192: ekena dvābhyāṃ tribhir aṣṭabhir vā kālena caivātmaguṇaiś ca sūkṣmaiḥ //
GV05svetu_pu:193: ārabhya karmāṇi guṇānvitāni bhāvāṃś ca sarvān viniyojayed yaḥ /
GV05svetu_pu:194: teṣām abhāve kṛtakarmanāśaḥ karmakṣaye yāti sa tattvato 'nyaḥ //
GV05svetu_pu:195: ādiḥ sa saṃyoganimittahetuḥ paras trikālād akalo 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ /
GV05svetu_pu:196: taṃ viśvarūpaṃ bhavabhūtam īḍyaṃ devaṃ svacittastham upāsya pūrvam //
GV05svetu_pu:197: sa vṛkṣakālākṛtibhiḥ paro 'nyo yasmāt prapañcaḥ parivartate 'yaṃ /
GV05svetu_pu:198: dharmāvahaṃ pāpanudaṃ bhageśaṃ jñātvātmastham amṛtaṃ viśvadhāma //
GV05svetu_pu:199: tam īśvarāṇāṃ paramaṃ maheśvaraṃ taṃ devatānāṃ paramaṃ ca daivataṃ /
GV05svetu_pu:200: patiṃ patīnāṃ paramaṃ parastād vidāma devaṃ bhuvaneśam īḍyam // SvetUp_6.7
GV05svetu_pu:201: na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate na tatsamaś cābhyadhikaś ca dṛśyate /
GV05svetu_pu:202: parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca //
GV05svetu_pu:203: na tasya kaścit patir asti loke na ceśitā naiva ca tasya liṅgaṃ /
GV05svetu_pu:204: sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścij janitā na cādhipaḥ //
GV05svetu_pu:205: yas tantunābha iva tantubhiḥ pradhānajaiḥ svabhāvataḥ /
GV05svetu_pu:206: deva ekaḥ svam āvṛṇoti sa no dadhād brahmāpyayam // SvetUp_6.10 //
GV05svetu_pu:207: eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā /
GV05svetu_pu:208: karmādhyakṣaḥ sarvabhūtādhivāsaḥ sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaś ca //
GV05svetu_pu:209: eko vaśī niṣkriyāṇāṃ bahūṇām ekaṃ bījaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karoti /
GV05svetu_pu:210: tam ātmasthaṃ ye 'nupaśyanti dhīrās teṣāṃ sukhaṃ śāśvataṃ netareṣāṃ //
GV05svetu_pu:211: nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān /
GV05svetu_pu:212: tat kāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyayogādhigamyaṃ jñātvā devaṃ mucyate sarvapāśaiḥ //
GV05svetu_pu:213: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yam agniḥ
GV05svetu_pu:214: tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti //
GV05svetu_pu:215: eko haṃso bhuvanasyāsya madhye sa evāgniḥ salile saṃniviṣṭaḥ /
GV05svetu_pu:216: tam eva viditvāti mṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya // SvetUp_6.15
GV05svetu_pu:217: sa viśvakṛd viśvavid ātmayonir jñaḥ kālakālo guṇī sarvavidyaḥ /
GV05svetu_pu:219: sa tanmayo hy amṛta īśasaṃstho jñaḥ sarvago bhuvanasyāsya goptā /
GV05svetu_pu:220: sa īśe asya jagato nityam eva nānyo hetur vidyata īśanāya // SvetUp_6.17
GV05svetu_pu:221: yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃś ca prahiṇoti tasmai /
GV05svetu_pu:222: taṃ ha devam ātmabuddhiprakāśaṃ mumukṣur vai śaraṇam ahaṃ prapadye //
GV05svetu_pu:224: amṛtasya paraṃ setuṃ dagdhendhanam ivānalam // SvetUp_6.19 //
GV05svetu_pu:226: tadā devam avijñāya duḥkhasyānto bhaviṣyati // SvetUp_6.20 //
GV05svetu_pu:227: tapaḥprabhāvād devaprasādāt brahma ha śvetāśvataro 'tha vidvān /
GV05svetu_pu:228: atyāśramibhyaḥ paramaṃ pavitraṃ provāca samyag ṛṣisaṅghajuṣṭam //
GV05svetu_pu:230: nāpraśāntāya dātavyaṃ nāputrāyāśiṣyāya vā punaḥ // SvetUp_6.22 //
GV05svetu_pu:231: yasya deve parā bhaktir yathā deve tathā gurau /
GV05svetu_pu:232: tasyaite kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ //
